# Bun Instructions

Auto-loaded context when editing bun-related files.

## Quick Start

```bash

.github/copilot-skills/bun/
```

## File Patterns

- `**/*.ts`
- `**/*.tsx`
- `**/*.js`
- `**/*.jsx`
- `**/bunfig.toml`
- `**/package.json`
